a: Our standard MOQ is 1 metric ton for most products. For samples and small orders, please contact our sales team for availability and pricing.

q: How and when will we get the sample?
a: Sample lead time is usually 3-7 working days depending on stock and shipping method. Express sample delivery is available at buyer's expense.

a: We use kraft paper bags with PE liner in 25kg or 20kg sizes, and can arrange different packaging on request (e.g., 20ft containers with palletized bags).
Common payment terms are T/T 30% deposit and 70% before shipment. L/C at sight can be arranged for larger orders.

a: Delivery time typically ranges from 20 to 45 days depending on destination, container availability, and order quantity.
Price varies with specifications, quantity, and market conditions. Please request a quotation with your required grade and quantity.
We guarantee product quality per agreed specifications. Any quality dispute should be raised within 30 days of receipt with supporting lab reports and pictures.
